about_the_game:
You have become part of a recruitment program for some shady company.
The plan was to enter an underwater ruin, explore it, and give a large prize to anyone who escaped.
Be sure to remember the instructions given by the company.

If you find any anomalies, descend.

If there are no anomalies, ascend.

If you reach sea level, you have escaped safely.

Gameplay

This is a walking simulator genre game inspired by The Exit 8.
Explore underwater ruins to discover anomalies and decide whether to ascend or descend.
Some anomalies may attack you.

The game supports two difficulty levels: Classic (Easy) mode and Normal mode.
  • Classic mode: This is a basic mode where you have to find anomalies and escape. The difficulty level is low and you start out in classic mode.
  • Normal mode: This mode increases the level of difficulty by adding oxygen management and photo taking functions. Unlocked upon clearing Classic Mode.
The average play time of the game is expected to be around 1 to 2 hours.

Controls

WASD: Move
Left Shift: Thruster
Spacebar: Ascend
Left Ctrl: Descend
Left mouse button: Headlight
Right mouse button: Take photo

Streaming Guidelines

Anyone, regardless of whether they are an individual or a corporation, can broadcast without permission.
There are no sounds that could be a copyright issue.
We would appreciate it if you could write down the title of the game and a link to the Steam store.
